mapper.insert: insert into members(id, name, password, gender, hobby, address1,address2, mpoint,hiredate) values(#{id},#{name},#{password},#{gender},#{hobby},#{address1},#{address2},#{mpoint},sysdate)
mapper.update: update members set name=#{name}, password=#{password}, gender=#{gender}, hobby=#{hobby}, address1=#{address1}, address2=#{address2}, mpoint=#{mpoint} where id=#{id}
update members set mpoint = mpoint + #{mpoint} where id = #{id}
